title: WTB T205 A Leifield Hindu back

posts.post_title: WTB T205 A Leifield Hindu back
posts.post_content: graded or not - will consider all cards.  Email scans and price to [url]hcv123@att.net[/url]
Pretty sure that card does not come with a Hindu back.
I'm in touch with the owner of one - who lucky for him and sadly for me isn't looking to part with it currently.  Anyone else?
